title: Hanasake! Otome Juku
sinopse:
The story takes place at the beginning of the 20th Century. A doctor in his mid-twenties comes to an all-girls school, where students strive to become independent women despite societal expectations. There he becomes a German teacher, but quickly gets involved in a different kind of classes.

Included one-shots:
Volume 1: Bandit Kitty
Volume 2: House Lunch
